comments.body: Ditto the previous comments on spaces vs `;` in CLI invocation.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +18,22 @@if [ "$TRAVIS_SCALA_VERSION" = "$MAIN_SCALA_VERSION" ]; then
    echo "Uploading coverage for Scala $TRAVIS_SCALA_VERSION"
    sbt -Dsbt.profile=coverage ";++$TRAVIS_SCALA_VERSION;coverageAggregate;coverageReport"
    bash <(curl -s https://codecov.io/bash)
else
